title: Options Premium Strategy Selector
purpose: Choose between premium selling vs buying based on IV regime and momentum.
rationale: High IV rank and contango slope favor premium selling; low IV rank and backwardation may favor buying.

reading_guide.signal_logic: if iv_rank>0.7 and slope>0 => sell premium; if iv_rank<0.3 and slope<0 and momentum up => buy

beginner_summary: High IV usually favors selling premium; low IV can favor buying if trend helps.
assistant_hints: High IV rank (>70%) generally favors selling premium.
Low IV rank (<30%) can favor buying premium if momentum aligns.
Term slope (contango) supports short vol; backwardation cautions.
Avoid earnings/major events; IV regime shifts can invert signals.
